#nametype [nametype]: 106
Lictors were once Ermorian dignitaries entrusted with keeping the peace during the heyday of the Empire. With the rise of Sceleria and the emergence of the Death Cult, their responsibilities have changed. Now they form a sacred elite force charged with the task of keeping the dead in line with axes blessed by the Thaumaturgs to halt the dead.
